remarks: The scalar multiplication operation of an image structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)
statement:
imasbas.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( F "s R ) ) $.
imasbas.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
imasbas.f $e |- ( ph -> F : V -onto-> B ) $.
imasbas.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Z ) $.
imassca.g $e |- G = ( Scalar ` R ) $.
imasvsca.k $e |- K = ( Base ` G ) $.
imasvsca.q $e |- .x. = ( .s ` R ) $.
imasvsca.s $e |- .xb = ( .s ` U ) $.
imasvsca $p |- ( ph -> .xb = U_ q e. V ( p e. K , x e. { ( F ` q ) } |-> ( F ` ( p .x. q ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d F p q x $.
$d K p x $.
$d R p q x $.
$d U x $.
$d V p q $.
$d p ph q x $.
